trans-unit.source: Aerial Assault
trans-unit.target: 空中突袭

trans-unit.resname: M20·1 | Aerial Assault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标已横置的生物。你每操控一个具飞行异能的生物，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."\n—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist
trans-unit.target: 「噢，你肯定哪里搞错了。老鹰虽凶猛，但不会一起行动。」 ～鸟类学家本德迪垂克

trans-unit.resname: M20·2 | Ajani, Strength of the Pride | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: M20·2 | Ajani, Strength of the Pride | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: You gain life equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of planeswalkers you control.\n−2: Create a 2/2 white Cat Soldier creature token named Ajani's Pridemate with "Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate."\n0: If you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, exile CARDNAME and each artifact and creature your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: +1：你获得若干生命，其数量等同于由你操控的生物数量与由你操控的鹏洛客数量之总和。 −2：派出一个2/2白色，名称为阿耶尼的群伴之猫／士兵衍生生物，且具有「每当你获得生命时，在阿耶尼的群伴上放置一个+1/+1指示物。」 0：如果你的总生命比你的起始总生命至少多15点，则放逐CARDNAME和所有由对手操控的神器与生物。

trans-unit.source: "You two, cover the alley! You, with me! Eyes on windows, balconies, and rooftops. Who knows what a fish-octopus-crab can do!"
trans-unit.target: 「你们俩，给我看好巷子！你，跟我来！窗口、阳台、屋顶这些地方都给我盯紧了。谁知道那个鱼头蟹身八爪怪能闹出什么乱子来！」

trans-unit.source: Impassioned Orator
trans-unit.target: 激情雄辩家

trans-unit.resname: M20·306 | Impassioned Orator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: In times of unrest, the crowd is eager for the comfort of strong convictions.
trans-unit.target: 在动荡之时，民众更渴望从严正说辞中得到慰藉。

trans-unit.source: Imperial Outrider
trans-unit.target: 帝国前导兵

trans-unit.source: Her mount's hollow crest can produce a trumpeting warning that carries for miles, summoning more knights to her aid.
trans-unit.target: 她身下坐骑羽冠中空，用作号角时警告鸣响可传彻数哩，召来骑士同袍相助。

trans-unit.source: Ironclad Krovod
trans-unit.target: 披甲克瓦兽

trans-unit.source: "We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"\n—Gideon Jura
trans-unit.target: 「我们必须把广场的出口都堵上！手边有什么又大又沉的东西吗？」 ～基定尤拉

trans-unit.source: Prowling Caracal
trans-unit.target: 潜行狞猫

trans-unit.source: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.
trans-unit.target: 生于城市的捕猎者需深谙机敏狩猎之道方能存活：有十足把握时方才扑击，而后藏猎物遗骸于隐蔽之处。

trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 警戒（此生物攻击时不需横置。） 由你操控的其他生物具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: She watches over the city just as Serra watches over all.
trans-unit.target: 她像撒拉守护众生一般保卫全城。

trans-unit.resname: M20·311 | Show of Valor | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 英勇展现

trans-unit.resname: M20·311 | Show of Valor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As the knight struggled to stand, his squire took up his blade. The foe advanced not a single step."\n—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*
trans-unit.target: 「骑士中箭倒地，挣扎想要站起。正在这时，他身边扈从捡起掉落长剑挡在身前。面对此景，敌人竟不敢前进半步。」 ～柯琳娅，《骨塔围攻纪》**

trans-unit.source: Siege Mastodon
trans-unit.target: 攻城乳齿象

trans-unit.target: 「恶人的墙壁将在我们面前倒塌。备好攻城机械。我们要上阵了！」 ～阿维托拉将军

trans-unit.target: 报仇

trans-unit.source: Coral Merfolk

trans-unit.source: "Safe passage requires only a simple answer to a simple question, traveler."

trans-unit.source: Snapping Drake

trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.
trans-unit.target: 这龙兽的脾气暴躁，训练不足，个性固执，非常适合测试主人的意志。

trans-unit.source: At night, bats will feast on whatever is drawn to lanterns and streetlights.

trans-unit.target: 「它们虽然个头大，但都是温顺的食草动物。小心靠近，然后口中哼点小曲，让它们知道你没有恶意。」 ～薇薇安瑞德

trans-unit.target: 「如果尚有余温的尸体用完了，那么已经死透的躯骨能派上用场。」 ～札戈斯沼的墨垂兹

trans-unit.source: It glides on silent wings across the midnight sky, and a dread host rises to follow.

trans-unit.source: Walking Corpse

trans-unit.source: "What does it mean when the dead feed on the dead? When no new life emerges, but only more death? Is it not an endless spiral into annihilation?"\n—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves
trans-unit.target: 「当死者相食，这意味着什么？当新生不在，唯死者堆积，这又意味着什么？这难道不是引致全面毁灭的无尽回旋吗？」 ～墓地哲人杰葛

trans-unit.source: Fearless Halberdier

trans-unit.target: 他耐心不够，脑子不灵，热情不足，神志不清，体味不佳，模仿不好，自制不行，啥都不会，但他的野蛮破坏力补回了这一切。

trans-unit.target: 如果要加入公会，哪怕是加入古鲁，都意味着要放弃部分独立自由。他宁愿由着性子去破坏。

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nHaste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

trans-unit.target: 「从后方靠近。这样就算它暴冲，你也不会立刻遭殃。」 ～薇薇安瑞德

trans-unit.target: 皮下探出的骨刺原本主要用于自保，但当其上积满森林的残叶之后，也能起到伪装之用。

trans-unit.target: 他排除掉森林高处的任何威胁. . .除了蜘蛛本身。

trans-unit.target: {1}{G}：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。此异能每回合只能起动一次。

trans-unit.source: "Even the smallest creatures are fierce in defense of their own territory."\n—Vivien Reid
trans-unit.target: 「就算是体型最为渺小的生物，在守卫自己地盘的时候也会凶相毕露。」 ～薇薇安瑞德

trans-unit.target: 橡树形体

trans-unit.target: 「如果野兽藏身在雄伟橡树中，弓岂能奈他何？如果橡树有咆哮的野兽护身，斧头岂能奈他何？」 ～妖精高位德鲁伊戴欧诺

trans-unit.source: Prized Unicorn
trans-unit.target: 珍奇独角兽

trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block CARDNAME do so.
trans-unit.target: 所有能够阻挡CARDNAME的生物皆须阻挡之。

trans-unit.source: "Friend and foe alike are irresistibly drawn to its beauty—the good, to their lasting reward, and the evil, to their brief and painful regret."\n—Vivien Reid
trans-unit.target: 「无论敌友都无法抗拒其华美而趋前～对于善者而言，这会是其受用终身的奖赏；而对恶者而言，这便是其短暂却又痛苦的惩罚。」 ～薇薇安瑞德

trans-unit.source: Titanic Growth
trans-unit.target: 巨力成长

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+4/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.
trans-unit.target: 大家伙靠力量统治。小家伙凭智慧生存。当心变成大家伙的小家伙。

trans-unit.source: Woodland Mystic
trans-unit.target: 林地秘教徒

trans-unit.resname: M20·344 | Woodland Mystic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.
"I sing to the branches, and they reach to the sky. I sing to the leaves, and they open to the sun. I sing to the roots, and they dig their fingers deep. I sing the song that creation sung."
trans-unit.target: 「枝桠闻我歌声，迎空扬碧伸扬。树叶闻我歌声，沐日茂密绽放。根茎闻我歌声，破土繁茂生长。问我旋律为何，这是造物之歌。」
